title: illaoi e causing bug splat anyone else?
body: Happened once in aram wil lulu but still 2 of us bugsplatted

replies.body: I have had similar problems with the Illaoi E causing problems with the LoL client, but not with bugsplat, but my screen glitches out, and it seems as if the client can't handle it, because it never happens otherwise. (This is honestly the only reason I hate illaoi, nice character design, terrible for my computer)

Hiya! 

This doesn't appear to be something we're receiving reports on, other than this one! I'd suggest trying a client repair - 

* Run League of Legends
* Click on the '?' button that is located in the top right corner of the window
* Click Repair
* Wait. The repair function can take anywhere from 5 minutes to over 30 depending on the number of corrupt files it has to repair

If you're still experiencing the bugsplat after repairing your client, please lemme know!
